title: nambu kaNDya
sahitya:
nambu kaNDya manave nambu shrI krSNana caraNa kamalava


caraNam 1    ombhattu bAgila paTTaNadoLage sambhramadinda balilAgada munna nI
    caraNam 2    Aru mandi kaLLaru UroLage surEmADi gAsi mADada munna nI
    caraNam 3    Elu suttina kODe ghanadurgavannu kAlavanaru bandu kareyada munna nI
    caraNam 4    dEha nAyaka dEvaru tAvu dEhada biDage biDabAda munna nI
    caraNam 5    puravidu sthiravalla mecci keDalu bEDa purandara viTTlanna A pAdapadumava
